snippet: The Legislature has approved changes to an environmental statute that has been broadly criticized as encouraging needless litigation and construction delays.
abstract: California Legislature approves changes to environmental statute that has been broadly criticized as encouraging needless litigation and construction delays; changes would exempt some urban projects from including parking and aesthetics as part of mandatory environmental reviews, one of many goals of business leaders.
lead_paragraph: The Legislature has approved changes to an environmental statute that has been broadly criticized as encouraging needless litigation and construction delays.

headline.main: California: Changes Made to Environment Measure
headline.print_headline: California: Changes Made To Environment Measure
